column5: Awesome video my buddy got last week fishing with his lady down in Florida.

Yes I agree. Don't lip that fish Canuck! I am amazed at the quality of video we can get now for a few hundred bucks. Not that long ago a film crew and a Chopper would cost many thou to capture what your buddy got there. My kudos to him Dave.
Man, why did he punch the throttle? He just about killed the woman! Amazing footage though!!

He was trying to pull the tarpon away from the bull shark. Cindy's a pretty tough chick. Notice how my buddy completely ignored her to get the shot? 10:1 she was on her back yelling "Did you get the shot Sam?"
^^^ LOL!! Incredible footage....and crazy HD. The thing that really impressive to me was, you can even see the clouds of blood in the water.
Tarpon becomes bull shark lunch and Sam and Cindy go back to fishing.
luckily she fell into boat and not out of it or Cindy would have been bull shark lunch!
